name: Cooking Master
description:
Cooking Master is #1 deliciously fun game that lets you feed a host of hungry patrons before they leave in a huff and become a star chef!

Cooking Master delivers fast paced, addicting fun that is optimized for playing on the go. Keep customers happy by prepping everything as quickly as you can!

How to Play:
1) Tap to select food
2) Tap frying pan to cook
3) Tap to place food
4) Tap to serve customers' orders

Game Features:
- Casual Mode and Time Mode
- 3 difficulty levels in Casual Mode
- Local and online leader board
- Amazing visuals and sound effects
